data.persona: I keep our town safe. I make sure to check the caravans for bandits. If the King needs anything extra hands in the kingdom he can count on me.
data.description:
You are in the Sheriff Office.
The sheriff's office is a small building on the southern edge of the farm. There is a desk with decrees from the king and other papers strewn about. Hanging on the wall are swords and other weapons. The room is small and cluttered, with various books and other things strewn about.
The prisoner is here.

You are carrying a lantern and a type of handcuff, and wearing a sword and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the prisoner from escaping.
data.mid_motivation: I must stop the prisoner's gang from robbing commoners throughout the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I must learn the identities of all the prisoner's accomplices on the outside, so they can all be rounded up and arrested.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the toilet to relieve myself.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat a hearty meal at my desk, while keeping my eyes on the prisoner.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop a set of keys from atop my desk while eating. The keys land closely to the bars of the prisoner's cell. The prisoner is able to bring the cell door ajar and make a run for the door!

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the prisoner to the exit.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the sword and threaten to kill the prisoner if he takes another step.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put the prisoner on his cell and lock the door, then resume my interrogation process to learn the identities of his accomplices on the outside.
